name: Google PageRank Display
author: Bora

sections.description:
Google PageRank Display shows your site pagerank instantly and you can change style from General Options.
more than 130+ pagerank buttons & badges.
* Install files
* Activate the plugin
* Go General Options [options-general.php?page=gpdisplay]
* Choose style you like
* Update option

  • And add this code your theme // <?php show_gpdisplay() ?>

Features:

  • Real Google Pagerank : Shows real google pagerank, not fake
  • Many Style : There are 134 different pagerank button and badges
  • Automatic : just you change style from option
  • Fast : Loading pagerank fast, get image remotely.
  • Get your site page rank instantly

Details: http://www.getrank.org

Arbitrary section

See homepage for updates http://www.getrank.org .

Instantly Check Free Your Site Google PageRank **
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the files
  2. Upload “google-pagerank-display” directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin from the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. (optional) Change style from Settings > GP Display
  • And add this code your theme // <?php show_gpdisplay() ?>
sections.changelog:

1.1 Version

Fixed * Selected style

1.0 Initial version
